intro: Uncover the secret of the girls, step by step!
description:
Collect fascinating puzzles with images of charming girls in anime style. With each assembled image, you discover a new secret - new images, emotions and details. Touch control makes the process natural, as if you were really touching each element.

Relaxing music helps to immerse yourself in the atmosphere, and the difficulty increases gradually, turning each level into an exciting challenge. After completion, you can examine the image in detail and enjoy every little thing.

Features:
• Unique images of girls in anime style.
• The effect of complete immersion thanks to touch control.
• New images and characters that open up as you progress.
• Gradually more difficult levels for an exciting game.
• Atmospheric music that creates a mood.
• Detailed view of the image after assembly.
